title.rendered: TTE wins FMME Award 2022 for Engineering Services

content.rendered: TTE was shortlisted in 4 categories and won the ‘Highly Commended Award’ in the category of Engineering Services of the year at the recently held FMME Awards, 2022. The category focused on companies that demonstrated the best record of service delivery by its MEP division, along with implementation of the latest cutting-edge technologies and practices to advance the technical proficiency of their employees. TTE won the Highly Commended award for the various MEP Retrofit projects it executed in 2021.

The category focused on companies that demonstrated the best record of service delivery by its MEP division, along with implementation of the latest cutting-edge technologies and practices […]
